nodes.text: Glen Taffral was a male farmer who was the father of Dav and Webb Taffral. Months after the Battle of Endor, Glen was present at a family dinner at the Taffral home on the planet Saleucami.
Glen Taffral appeared in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig as the first installment in Star Wars: The Aftermath Trilogy.
